free_text.Learning outcomes: To pursue the introduction of the future architects to project management, which amounts to about one half of an architecture firm's activity in Switzerland. To accelerate their professionalization. At the end of the course, they will be able to advise their client on the development and organization of a construction or restoration project. They will also be able to check the project's economic and financial feasibility.[br/]
free_text.Content: Selection of service providers (agents). Architecture contests.[br/]Selection of building firms. Adjudication and contracts.[br/]Fees of the architects: calculation methods; level and evolution of the fees.[br/]Financing of the project: financial plans; forms of credit.[br/]Profitability of the project: forecasts of incomes and costs; profitability.[br/]The cost of the project: estimation methods; uncertainty margins; responsibility of architect.[br/]The project: surfaces and volumes; effectiveness; sources of comparative data.[br/]

Ils/elles sauront également vérifier la faisabilité économique et financière du projet.[br/]
